cast.name: 谢尔盖·马科韦茨基 Sergey Makovetskiy
弗拉基米尔·斯捷克洛夫 Vladimir Steklov

director.name: 亚历山大·韦迪斯基 Aleksandr Veledinsky

this_title: Ty da ya, da my s toboy
introduction: A story about love, hate and loneliness, depicting several days from the life of two brothers. They work as track walkers on a railway somewhere in rural Russia. It is an screen adaptation of the short story "Two Guys from the Track Walkers' Hut on the 9th km". The author of the story, Vyacheslav Pietsukh, is a well-known contemporary Russian writer. He writes mostly about ordinary Russians.
foreign_title: Ty da ya, da my s toboy
